content.p: With the David Ross Sports Village open on University Park campus there has never been a better time to get involved and stay active. Our great value sports and fitness membership gives you access to all our sports facilities, situated on University Park, Jubilee and Sutton Bonington campus. Student members can use our fully-equipped fitness suites, join a fitness class or book a court to play a game of squash and badminton. The David Ross Sports Village also has a swimming pool and a climbing wall you can use. Explore our sports and recreation facilities Student enquire centre We have over 70 sports clubs you can join, from Aikido to Windsurfing. Clubs compete against other Universities, but many have fun sessions perfect for beginners as well. Our intramural sports leagues and tournaments take place on campus, so you can join a hall or society team or get a group of friends together to play. Sports include football, netball and volleyball If you want to play for fun, our Just Play programme has over 20 beginner and social sessions to choose from. It’s just £3 a session or free for sports and fitness members. We offer bespoke support for students with a disability with lots of inclusive sports and sessions to take up. You can develop your employability skills through sport by volunteering with our leadership academy.
